extendedInfo.description: IN POCKET GAMERS TOP 10 GAMES OF SEPTEMBER 2011!!http://www.pocketgamer.co.uk/r/Android/Top+10+Android+charts/feature.asp?c=34099You are the best paint mixer weâve got! Get down to the factory & start mixing.Your job is simple, get the paint from one end of the factory to the other! Donât forget sometimes you need to mix colors together, or split them apart! Thereâs also the fact you canât always see the end, the paint will start flowing without you realising, some pipes are faster than others.... Nothing you canât handle though!Pipe Swipe features:70 exciting levels!Progressive challenges!Star achievements!Mind twisting puzzlesCan you make it to the end of the shift? Can you get a gold star on each round to become employee of the year? Thereâs only one way to find out!

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This is def one of my favorite games I can literally play it for hours I highly reccomend it. It does get a bit chellenging after level 60 only thing I would change is that you should be able to bypass levels if you cant beat them and then come back to it later but other then that its great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Much more involved than the basic pipe type games. Brilliant and well worth buying the full version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost fun
reviews.comment: Once the new wears off using the accelerometer having to tip the tablet to scrolls is just time consuming and tiring. Drag would be So much better. Also the tip just seems backwards to me. Lastly when I got to level 27 it appears to have a bug. Everything goes where it belongs but the game says I still lose. Really wish I hadn\'t bought this.
reviews.author: Terry Hutchinson

reviews.title: great game but...
reviews.comment: Unfortunately after purchasing I\'m having issues even getting the game to start as it apparently needs to do a licence check which no matter how I try I still can\'t access the game. Emailed support so fingers crossed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome game.. Well addictive.. The ladies loved it as well.

reviews.comment: Free version contains 16 levels, not only the tutorial.. thanks great game....fully addicted!
